content.description: Sit start, and layback with your feet out left. Start on a sloper ledge, then move your right hand up to a little dish. From there, there's a good blocky jug (I hit it with my left hand). Then move out to a jug up higher to the left (I crossed over for my own beta). From there, climb straight up to a nice, jug topout. Top out to the left of the bush growing out of the boulder (reference the photo).
content.location: There is a seam that runs down the taller part of the boulder. It starts to the left of that and moves straight up (reference the photo).

content.description:
Sit start low again. Start on a crimp rail, move up to a great pocket, and from here, fire up an amazing gaston. To top out, use the blocky edges, and eventually move to a huge jug to lip out.

(I will try to get a better photo next time I head out here.)
content.location:
This starts to the right of the seam in the middle of the boulder, to the right of '

Jumping, Jumboplane Jamboree

'.
